name: 2048 Roller
description:
# The classic 2048 puzzle is a fun, addictive and a very simple number puzzle game. You join the numbers and get to the 2048 tile!

# This 2048 game is an upgraded version of the current popular 2048 game. This is a super 2048 puzzle, you roll and shoot the balls to get larger and larger numbers. Be ready for a new challenge!

# This is the latest 2048 game which is addicted and challenging to play. Watch and shoot the number ball as it goes around the roller. When you match 3 balls with the same number, you will get a new ball with larger number!

HOW TO PLAY:
Swipe (Up, Down, Left, Right) to shoot the balls. When three balls with the same number touch, they merge into one. When 2048 tile is created, the player wins! 8 .. 16 ... 1024 .. 2048.
When there is no empty spot on the board or if you run out of laps, you lose.

Keep in mind that you only have limited laps for each level, shoot the ball as soon as possible before it passes the starting line and costs you a lap. Merge more balls and get higher score before you run out of laps!

FEATURES
- Merge 3 number balls to get a larger one
- Super 2048 Plus puzzle game
- Keep playing for High-score after collected 2048 tile
- Game is automatically saved
- Shoot balls before you run out of laps
- Beautiful and simple UI
- High score

Keep playing it, thinking over it, practicing your brain, you will be a pro of this fun puzzle app. Among all the cool math games, number games and logic puzzles apps, this free 2048 roller super game is a most addictive app that you can get your brain trained, get fun out of it and make you thinking.

It is so simple to play that it’s not only for adult, teenagers, but also for kids.
Slide the screen, combine and join the numbers, get to 128, 256, 512, 1024, 2048 and win at last!

Download it now! Start playing this awesome and relaxing 2048 puzzle game, merging the numbers and experiencing the cool math logic, then you can get logic fun from joining the numbers. Compete with your friends to see who can reach the best score.
